pullRequest.title: Fix Global Config Test
pullRequest.bodyText: No distinction was being made between success and error messages in validation.

commit.message: Feat(ValidationResponseModel): Add hasErrors flag as a member variable
Fix(UI): Update global config validation error handling
Fix(ValidationResponseModel): Rename static initializer for errors

nodes.bodyText: The changes here are all linting. I originally thought I had to modify something here, but did not end up needing to. I decided to leave the linting as an incremental improvement.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -6,7 +6,11 @@ import FieldsPanel from 'field/FieldsPanel';
 import ConfigurationLabel from 'component/common/ConfigurationLabel';

nodes.bodyText: I'm not a fan of this name. Why is it getConfig1? If it's a duplicate item there should be a better name.
This has updateConfig1, there should be a better name for this.

commit.message: Fix(JS): Rename auto-generated linting destructure variables
